title: Vivaldi - The Very Best of Vivaldi (Various, 2005)
description:
The Very Best of Vivaldi (2005)
		Antonio Vivaldi (1678-1741)


			Composition / (Performers):

1	The Four Seasons: Violin Concerto in E major, Op. 8, No. 1, RV 269, "La primavera" (Spring): I. Allegro
	 (Stephen Gunzenhauser / Capella Istropolitana / Takako Nishizaki)
	
2	Flute Concerto in G minor, Op. 10, No. 2, RV 439, "La notte"
	 (Nicolaus Esterhazy Sinfonia / Bela Drahos)
	
3	Concerto for 2 Cellos in G minor, RV 531: I. Allegro
	 (Nicholas Kraemer / City of London Sinfonia / Raphael Wallfisch / Keith Hurvey)
	
4	Concerto for 2 Cellos in G minor, RV 531: II. Largo
	 (Nicholas Kraemer / City of London Sinfonia / Raphael Wallfisch / Keith Hurvey)
	
5	Concerto for Strings in G major, RV 151, "Alla Rustica"
	 (Stephen Gunzenhauser / Capella Istropolitana / Takako Nishizaki)
	
6	Griselda, RV 718: Aria: Agitata da due venti (Costanza)
	 (Edward H. Tarr / Wasa Baroque Ensemble / Niklas Eklund / Maria Keohane)
	
7	Bassoon Concerto in A minor, RV 498
	 (Bela Drahos / Nicolaus Esterhazy Sinfonia / Tamas Benkocs)
	
8	The Four Seasons: Violin Concerto in G minor, Op. 8, No. 2, RV 315, "L'estate" (Summer): III. Presto
	 (Stephen Gunzenhauser / Capella Istropolitana / Takako Nishizaki)
	
9	Concerto for 2 Trumpets in C major, RV 537
	 (Nicholas Kraemer / City of London Sinfonia / Crispian Steele-Perkins / Michael Meeks)
	
10	Concerto for 4 Violins in B minor, Op. 3, No. 10, RV 580 (L'Estro Armonico)
	 (Jozef Kopelman / Capella Istropolitana)
	
11	12 Violin Sonatas, Op. 2: No. 2 in A major, RV 31
	 (Bin Huang / Hyun-Sun Kim)
	
12	Sopranino Recorder Concerto in C major, RV 444
	 (Oliver Dohnanyi / Capella Istropolitana / Jiri Stivin)
	
13	Gloria in D major, RV 589: I. Gloria in excelsis Deo
	 (Nicholas Ward / Northern Chamber Orchestra / Oxford Schola Cantorum)
	
14	Sopranino Recorder Concerto in C major, RV 443: I. Allegro
	 (Nicolaus Esterhazy Sinfonia / Laszlo Kecskemeti)
	
15	Sopranino Recorder Concerto in C major, RV 443: II. Largo
	 (Nicolaus Esterhazy Sinfonia / Laszlo Kecskemeti)
	
16	The Four Seasons: Violin Concerto in F major, Op. 8, No. 3, RV 293, "L'autunno" (Autumn): I. Allegro
	 (Stephen Gunzenhauser / Capella Istropolitana / Takako Nishizaki)
	
17	Flute Concerto in F major, Op. 10, No. 1, RV 433, "La tempesta di mare"
	 (Nicolaus Esterhazy Sinfonia / Bela Drahos)
	
18	Mandolin Concerto in C major, RV 425: I. Allegro
	 (Peter Holman / The Parley of Instruments / Paul O'Dette)
	
19	Nulla in mundo pax sincera, RV 630: I. Aria: Nulla in mundo pax sincera
	 (Kevin Mallon / Aradia Ensemble & Chorus / Jane Archibald)
	
20	12 Violin Concertos, Op. 4, "La stravaganza": No. 5 in A major, RV 347
	 (Nicholas Kraemer / City of London Sinfonia / Andrew Watkinson)
	
21	Chamber (Lute) Concerto in D major, RV 93: I. Allegro
	 (Peter Holman / The Parley of Instruments / Paul O'Dette)
	
22	Tito Manlio, RV 778, Act I: Combatta un gentil cor
	 (Edward H. Tarr / Wasa Baroque Ensemble / Niklas Eklund / Maria Keohane)
	
23	The Four Seasons: Violin Concerto in F minor, Op. 8, No. 4, RV 297, "L'inverno" (Winter): II. Largo
	 (Stephen Gunzenhauser / Capella Istropolitana / Takako Nishizaki)
	
24	Oboe Concerto in A minor, RV 461
	 (Pier Giorgio Morandi / Budapest Failoni Orchestra / Stefan Schilli)
	
25	Dixit Dominus in D major, RV 595: Gloria Patri, Sicut erat in principio - Et in saecula saeculorum
	 (Kevin Mallon / Aradia Ensemble & Chorus / Peter Mahon / Nils Brown / Giles Tomkins)
	

		"The Very Best of Vivaldi", retail 2005.

This is the 2CD "very best of" compilation from the naxos series with the cartoonish abomination album covers. The original front cover album art is obviously not embedded, but replaced with decent custom 600x600.

Codec profile is Opus VBR at bitrate 96 (libopus 1.1),
genre marked as Classical - and tracks are as always tagged and pretty.

Support your local naxos dealer.

				enjoy ! /dussin
